children.name: Custom Components
children.description: Brand new components and templates to help folks quickly get started with Bootstrap and demonstrate best practices for adding onto the framework.

children.name: Framework
children.description: Examples that focus on implementing uses of built -in components provided by Bootstrap.

children.name: Navbars
children.description: Taking the default navbar component and showing how it can be moved, placed, and extended.

children.name: Experiments
children.description: Examples that focus on future-friendly features or techniques.

contents.title: Album
contents.description: Simple one-page template for photo galleries, portfolios, and more.

contents.title: Pricing
contents.description: Example pricing page built with Cards and featuring a custom header and footer.

contents.title: Checkout
contents.description: Custom checkout form showing our form components and their validation features.

contents.title: Product
contents.description: Lean product-focused marketing page with extensive grid and image work.

contents.title: Cover
contents.description: A one-page template for building simple and beautiful home pages.

contents.title: Carousel
contents.description: Customize the navbar and carousel, then add some new components.

contents.title: Blog
contents.description: Magazine like blog template with header, navigation, featured content.

contents.title: Dashboard
contents.description: Basic admin dashboard shell with fixed sidebar and navbar.

contents.title: Sign-in
contents.description: Custom form layout and design for a simple sign in form.

contents.title: Sticky footer
contents.description: Attach a footer to the bottom of the viewport when page content is short.

contents.title: Sticky footer navbar
contents.description: Attach a footer to the bottom of the viewport with a fixed top navbar.

contents.title: Starter template
contents.description: Nothing but the basics: compiled CSS and JavaScript.

contents.title: Grid
contents.description: Multiple examples of grid layouts with all four tiers, nesting, and more.

contents.title: Jumbotron
contents.description: Build around the jumbotron with a navbar and some basic grid columns.

contents.title: Navbars
contents.description: Demonstration of all responsive and container options for the navbar.

contents.title: Navbar static
contents.description: Single navbar example of a static top navbar along with some additional content.

contents.title: Navbar fixed
contents.description: Single navbar example with a fixed top navbar along with some additional content.

contents.title: Navbar bottom
contents.description: Single navbar example with a bottom navbar along with some additional content.

contents.title: Floating labels
contents.description: Beautifully simple forms with floating labels over your inputs.

contents.title: Offcanvas
contents.description: Turn your expandable navbar into a sliding offcanvas menu.
